entry.title: Octopress
entry.content:
install

https://github.com/imathis/octopress

git clone https://github.com/imathis/octopress
bundle install
rake install

開新的repo，名稱打上 username.github.io

rake setup_github_pages

輸入: git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git

rake generate
rake deploy　　　=>　　　rake gen_deploy

git add .
git commit -am "ok"
git push origin source

! [rejected] master -> master (non-fast-forward)
cd _deploy
git pull origin master
cd ..
rake deploy

command

rake new_page["about"]
rake new_post["title"]

Category

ref http://codemacro.com/2012/07/18/add-category-list-to-octopress/
ref https://github.com/shunnien/octopress-category-list

code

#plugins/category_list_tag.rb
module Jekyll
  class CategoryList < Liquid::Tag
    def render(context)
      html = ""
      categories = context.registers[:site].categories.keys
      categories.sort.each do |category|
        posts_in_category = context.registers[:site].categories[category].size
        category_dir = context.registers[:site].config['category_dir']
        category_url = File.join(category_dir, category.gsub(/_|\P{Word}/, '-').gsub(/-{2,}/, '-').downcase)
        html << "<li class='category'><a href='http://icps0610.github.io/#{category_url}/'>#{category} (#{posts_in_category})</a></li>\n"
      end
      html
    end
  end
  class CategoryListTop < Liquid::Tag
    def render(context)
      html = ""
      categories = context.registers[:site].categories.keys
      categories.sort.each do |category|
        category_dir = context.registers[:site].config['category_dir']
        category_url = File.join(category_dir, category.gsub(/_|\P{Word}/, '-').gsub(/-{2,}/, '-').downcase)
        html << "<h2 class='entry-title'><a href='http://icps0610.github.io/#{category_url}/'>#{category}</a></h2>"
      end
      html

    end
  end
end

Liquid::Template.register_tag('category_list_top', Jekyll::CategoryListTop)
Liquid::Template.register_tag('category_list', Jekyll::CategoryList)

asides

#source/_includes/asides/category_list.html  
<section>  
  <h1>Categories</h1>  
    <ul id="categories">
       {% category_list %}
    </ul>
</section>

top

``` html

source/blog/categories/index.html

layout: page title: Categories

footer: false

{% category_list_top %} 

### 在上方加入連結

source/_includes/custom/navigation.html

  • Blog
  • Archives
  • Categories

```

貼語法語法

ref http://blog.slaks.net/2013-06-10/jekyll-endraw-in-code/

若要顯示 {% category_list_top %}

```
    {% raw %}{% category_list_top %}{% endraw %}
```

若要顯示 {% raw %}{% endraw %}

{% assign oTag = '{%' %}
# 然後在貼下半部
{{ oTag }}raw %}{% endraw %}
{{ oTag }}endraw %}{% endraw %}
